Articles.Content:
So after a long 3-2 Months of setup and fighting, the samsung windows 8 PC I got on christmas last year is finally up! I named them Sammy

My old Dell inspiron, Dell Conagher, Is dead... ...However, his spirit lives on in an external hard drive!

The computer is amazing. It has 1 Terabyte of data and it runs my games flawlessly and really fast. Which means I can play KSP At max graphics with little to no lag. Now I can have high terrain detail!
Specs? Also, since it has Windows 8, it's not amazing. Seriously, someone slap Microsoft for me.

Specs? Also, since it has Windows 8, it's not amazing. Seriously, someone slap Microsoft for me.

MS has been slapped to hell and back over the past few years. That's why they made a lot of improvements to W8 and it is now the best OS they've ever made.
Ahh the old Dell inspiron, I have two, the one i'm typing on right now (Laptop) and the desktop one. Both average at everything, so you could say their nominal

Specs? Also, since it has Windows 8, it's not amazing. Seriously, someone slap Microsoft for me.

My dad works for microsoft, one second... (jk)

At least 8.1 is better, though desktop support really is only there because they didn't want to make it impossible for desktop users to update, even though they seem to think desktops don't have any placer anymore. If we could get a windows 8 with no metro but still all the performance improvements (which supposedly exist), then it'd be fine, but that'd make too much sense.

I still like it for tablets/phones, but it really has no business in being on desktops.
